items.sentence: We've finally done what we've never been able to do before.
Tom put on so much weight that he had to get a longer belt.
Tom has only ever had one other girlfriend other than Mary.
Tom told me that he was going to write a book about Boston.
Tom's father taught him everything he knew about carpentry.
I don't think that Tom knows Mary has spent time in prison.
It's been more than three years since we came to live here.
You're supposed to knock before you enter someone's office.
Tom insisted that he didn't mean to say that Mary was ugly.
The road from the bus station to Tom's house is very steep.
